title: Scale Byte Function
description: This function takes an input byte value and scales it to a specified range defined by O_LO and O_HI based on two limits I_LO and I_HI. If the input high limit equals the input low limit, the function returns the output low value directly. Otherwise, it performs a scaling calculation to map the input variable to the output range.
name: SCALE_B

input.name: X
input.description: The input byte value to be scaled.

input.name: I_LO
input.description: The lower limit of the input range.

input.name: I_HI
input.description: The upper limit of the input range.

input.name: O_LO
input.description: The lower limit of the output range.

input.name: O_HI
input.description: The upper limit of the output range.

return_value.description: The scaled output value based on the input range and output limits.
